# Wrangle data {.tabset .tabset-sticky}

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
source("0_helpers.R")
```

## Load data

```{r}
msleep = readRDS("msleep_processed.rds")
```

## Basic model
```{r}
m1 = lm(sleep_rem ~ sleep_total, data = msleep)
summary(m1)
```

## Super-advanced model {.active .tabset .tabset-sticky}
 
### Summary
```{r}
m2 = lm(sleep_rem ~ sleep_total + brainwt + bodywt + eats, data = msleep)
summary(m2)
```

### Coefficient plot
```{r}
coefplot::coefplot(m2)
```


### Diagnostics
```{r}
plot(m2)
```
